data.title: Examples of "Joe" in a Sentence
data.meta_description: Learn how to use "joe" in a sentence with 377 example sentences on YourDictionary.
data.text:
“Just a cup of Joe for me,” says every movie detective to every movie waitress in every movie diner. She doesn’t ask what it means, or who Joe is, or how he would fit into a cup because she knows that “cup of Joe” means coffee. But why does Joe get this honor and not some other guy? No one knows for sure — but there are several plausible theories.

In literature, characters are described as either dynamic or static. All characters fall into one of these two categories. You can use alliteration to remember that static characters stay the same. Explore other ways you can better understand how static characters fit into fiction.
